detail_desc: Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps that double and cross at the back. Satin lining.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Thin metal hoop earrings. Diameter 6 cm.
Short V-neck dress in jersey with a heavy drape. 3/4-length sleeves, concealed pockets in the side seams and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned velour. Concealed zip down the front with a chin guard and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on the shoulder and at the crotch.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft rib knit with a deep V-neck and a drawstring at the back.
Tube scarf in a cotton knit with ribbed edges. Length 23 cm, circumference approx. 43 cm.
Partly lined, patterned bikini. Top with a flounce at the top that continues over one shoulder, and a narrow strap over the other shoulder. Lined at the front. Matching, fully lined bikini bottoms.
Leggings in jersey with a soft brushed finish. Wide foldover ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Running vest top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.
Fully lined bikini top with frills. Non fasteners.
Oversized, straight-cut jacket in twill made from a linen blend. Collar, notch lapels, buttons at the front, low dropped shoulders and large patch front pockets. Satin lining.
Skirt in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated waist and tasselled trim at the hem. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in softly draping, patterned silk in a straight-cut at the top with spaghetti shoulder straps that tie into loops at the back. Seam at the waist and pleats front and back. Unlined.
Short, sleeveless dress in glittery jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Unlined.
Flock-print tights with an elasticated waist.
Long earrings in metal and plastic. Length 5.5 cm, 6.5 cm and 7.5 cm.
Short, pleated skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist. Lined.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in soft fabric with smocking at the top and hem, and long wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a stripe print, high stand-up collar, long wide sleeves, concealed zip at the back and seam at the hem.

Kangol x H&M. Shopper in patent plastic with fabric-covered trims and handles. Kangol logo appliqué on the front and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap in a jacquard weave. Recycled polyester lining. Height 30 cm. Width 26 cm. Depth 11 cm.
5-pocket, high-waisted, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details. Slim legs with raw-edge hems.
Metal rings in various designs with decorative plastic stones.
Cotton jersey hipster briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Trousers in soft, washed cotton denim with elastication and a small frill trim at the waist and hems. Fake pockets. The cotton content of the trousers is partly recycled.

Set with a hat, tube scarf and a pair of gloves in a soft, fine knit. Hat with a turned-up hem with a small appliqué on the front. Tube scarf with a twisted detail at the front. Gloves with rib-knit cuffs.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with a round neck and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Press-studs at the sides, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Reflective details. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Soft toy in soft velour with embroidery and glittery appliqués. Removable satin dress with a skirt that has a layer of glittery tulle. Size approx. 23 cm.
Jumper in a jacquard knit containing glittery threads with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip at the front, notch lapels with decorative buttons, quilted sections, zipped side pockets and fake tabs at the sides. Lined.
Waterproof boots in rubber with reflective details. Calf-length shaft with a loop at the back, soft pile linings, fleece insoles and chunky soles.
Fully lined, one-shoulder bikini top with laser-cut, scalloped edges and an elasticated hem.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in a soft organic cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Twill cap with a small peak, decorative bow and covered elastication at the back. Lining in a cotton weave.
Glittery Alice band with tulle and bat-shaped appliqués on top.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Soft shopper with two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top, and one zipped inner compartment. Size 19x30x39 cm.
Pull-on jeans in stretch, supersoft denim in a loose fit with an elasticated drawstring waist. Fake fly, side pockets, a back pocket, and elasticated hems.
Long jumper in a loose rib knit containing glittery threads. Long, slightly wider raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports trousers in sturdy jersey with a drawstring at the top, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved jumper in a jacquard-knit cotton blend.

Shirt in a viscose weave with sturdier trim details. Collar, concealed buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Long, deep-cut raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs that can be rolled up and fastened with D-rings. Rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Mittens in a fine-knit wool blend decorated with faceted beads. Fold-down front flap with a button to turn them into fingerless gloves.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in cotton denim with a frill at the top, button at the waist, zip fly and detachable belt with a ring fastener.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elastic hem.

Cargo trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Patterned swimsuit with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard and 3/4-length raglan sleeves. Partly lined.
Leather trainers with lacing at the front. Fabric linings, leather insoles and embossed rubber soles.
Dress in printed glittery tulle with a round neckline, small opening with a button at the back of the neck and cap sleeves. Lined.
Cycling shorts in glossy jersey with wide elastication at the waist.
Set with a top and tiered skirt in soft cotton jersey. Top with short puff sleeves and a print motif on the front. Skirt with an elastic waistband.
Oversized jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a V-neck front and back, low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with closer-fitting cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Wide trousers in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and narrow hems.
Metal hair clips with wavy edges.
Fitted short-sleeved top in slub jersey made from organic cotton with a round neck and rounded hem.
Gloves in supple leather with ribbed cuffs. Lined in a soft wool blend.
Long-sleeved dress in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, smocking at the waist and cuffs and a wide skirt. Unlined.
Short, A-line dress in soft, slub cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, dropped shoulders, short, flounce-trimmed sleeves and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem.
Patterned joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Round-necked top in soft cotton jersey with short, elasticated, voluminous puff sleeves in a cotton weave that have a jersey lining. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Satin top with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey.

Oversized jacket in washed denim with a pile-lined collar, dropped shoulders and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, buttoned cuffs, and a tab with adjustable buttoning at the sides. Pile lining. The jacket is made partly from recycled cotton.
Wide waist belt with a round metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.
Scarf woven in a soft, striped viscose blend with fringes along the short sides. Size 80x180 cm.

Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood and buttons down the front. Patch front pockets, sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and hems, and concealed press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 1-3Y). Soft brushed inside.
Shorter top in sweatshirt fabric with motifs, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide elastic hem. Light support. Partly lined in mesh.
Jersey-lined joggers in a cotton weave with elasticated ribbing and a decorative drawstring at the waist, side pockets and an open back pocket. Legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, front and back pockets and straight hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist.
Nightshirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
